booru.name: Booru Tag List
booru.word_count: Write a list of Booru-like tags for this image within {word_count} words.
booru.length: Write a {length} list of Booru-like tags for this image.

danbooru.name: Danbooru Tag List
danbooru.general: Generate only comma-separated Danbooru tags (lowercase_underscores). Strict order: `artist:`, `copyright:`, `character:`, `meta:`, then general tags. Include counts (1girl), appearance, clothing, accessories, pose, expression, actions, background. Use precise Danbooru syntax. No extra text.
danbooru.word_count: Generate only comma-separated Danbooru tags (lowercase_underscores). Strict order: `artist:`, `copyright:`, `character:`, `meta:`, then general tags. Include counts (1girl), appearance, clothing, accessories, pose, expression, actions, background. Use precise Danbooru syntax. No extra text. {word_count} words or less.
danbooru.length: Generate only comma-separated Danbooru tags (lowercase_underscores). Strict order: `artist:`, `copyright:`, `character:`, `meta:`, then general tags. Include counts (1girl), appearance, clothing, accessories, pose, expression, actions, background. Use precise Danbooru syntax. No extra text. {length} length.

e621.name: E621 Tag List
e621.general: Write a comma-separated list of e621 tags in alphabetical order for this image. Start with the artist, copyright, character, species, meta, and lore tags (if any), prefixed by 'artist:', 'copyright:', 'character:', 'species:', 'meta:', and 'lore:'. Then all the general tags.
e621.word_count: Write a comma-separated list of e621 tags in alphabetical order for this image. Start with the artist, copyright, character, species, meta, and lore tags (if any), prefixed by 'artist:', 'copyright:', 'character:', 'species:', 'meta:', and 'lore:'. Then all the general tags. Keep it under {word_count} words.
e621.length: Write a {length} comma-separated list of e621 tags in alphabetical order for this image. Start with the artist, copyright, character, species, meta, and lore tags (if any), prefixed by 'artist:', 'copyright:', 'character:', 'species:', 'meta:', and 'lore:'. Then all the general tags.

generate_tags.name: Generate Tags
generate_tags.general: Generate a list of relevant tags for this image, focusing on key elements, themes, and subjects.
generate_tags.word_count: Generate a list of relevant tags for this image, focusing on key elements, themes, and subjects. Keep it under {word_count} words.
generate_tags.length: Generate a {length} list of relevant tags for this image, focusing on key elements, themes, and subjects.

rule34.name: Rule34 Tag List
rule34.general: Write a comma-separated list of rule34 tags in alphabetical order for this image. Start with the artist, copyright, character, and meta tags (if any), prefixed by 'artist:', 'copyright:', 'character:', and 'meta:'. Then all the general tags.
rule34.word_count: Write a comma-separated list of rule34 tags in alphabetical order for this image. Start with the artist, copyright, character, and meta tags (if any), prefixed by 'artist:', 'copyright:', 'character:', and 'meta:'. Then all the general tags. Keep it under {word_count} words.
rule34.length: Write a {length} comma-separated list of rule34 tags in alphabetical order for this image. Start with the artist, copyright, character, and meta tags (if any), prefixed by 'artist:', 'copyright:', 'character:', and 'meta:'. Then all the general tags.

art_critic.name: Art Critic Prompt
art_critic.general: Analyze this image like an art critic would with information about its composition, style, symbolism, the use of color, light, any artistic movement it might belong to, etc.
art_critic.word_count: Analyze this image like an art critic would with information about its composition, style, symbolism, the use of color, light, any artistic movement it might belong to, etc. Keep it within {word_count} words.
art_critic.length: Analyze this image like an art critic would with information about its composition, style, symbolism, the use of color, light, any artistic movement it might belong to, etc. Keep it {length}.

casual.name: Casual Prompt
casual.general: Write a descriptive caption for this image in a casual tone.
casual.word_count: Write a descriptive caption for this image in a casual tone in {word_count} words or less.
casual.length: Write a {length} descriptive caption for this image in a casual tone.

color_palette.name: Color Palette Prompt
color_palette.general: Describe the dominant colors and color palette of this image, mentioning any notable color combinations or contrasts.
color_palette.word_count: Describe the dominant colors and color palette of this image, mentioning any notable color combinations or contrasts. Keep it under {word_count} words.
color_palette.length: Describe the dominant colors and color palette of this image, mentioning any notable color combinations or contrasts. Make it {length}.

comparison.name: Comparison Prompt
comparison.general: Describe this image by comparing it to a well-known artwork, style, or genre, highlighting similarities and differences.
comparison.word_count: Describe this image by comparing it to a well-known artwork, style, or genre, highlighting similarities and differences. Keep it under {word_count} words.
comparison.length: Describe this image by comparing it to a well-known artwork, style, or genre, highlighting similarities and differences. Make it {length}.

descriptive.name: Descriptive Prompt
descriptive.general: Write a detailed description for this image.
descriptive.word_count: Write a detailed description for this image in {word_count} words or less.
descriptive.length: Write a {length} detailed description for this image.

environment.name: Environment Prompt
environment.general: Describe the environment or setting of this image, including location, time of day, and atmosphere.
environment.word_count: Describe the environment or setting of this image, including location, time of day, and atmosphere. Keep it under {word_count} words.
environment.length: Describe the environment or setting of this image, including location, time of day, and atmosphere. Make it {length}.

impressionistic.name: Impressionistic Prompt
impressionistic.general: Describe the overall impression or feeling this image gives, using evocative and atmospheric language rather than concrete details.
impressionistic.word_count: Describe the overall impression or feeling this image gives, using evocative and atmospheric language rather than concrete details. Keep it under {word_count} words.
impressionistic.length: Describe the overall impression or feeling this image gives, using evocative and atmospheric language rather than concrete details. Make it {length}.

instructional.name: Instructional Prompt
instructional.general: Describe this image as if giving instructions to an artist or AI on how to recreate it, specifying key elements, style, and composition.
instructional.word_count: Describe this image as if giving instructions to an artist or AI on how to recreate it, specifying key elements, style, and composition. Keep it under {word_count} words.
instructional.length: Describe this image as if giving instructions to an artist or AI on how to recreate it, specifying key elements, style, and composition. Make it {length}.

mood.name: Mood Prompt
mood.general: Describe the mood or emotional tone of this image, using expressive adjectives.
mood.word_count: Describe the mood or emotional tone of this image, using expressive adjectives. Keep it under {word_count} words.
mood.length: Describe the mood or emotional tone of this image, using expressive adjectives. Make it {length}.

multi_image_blend.name: Multiple Images (Blend)
multi_image_blend.general: Describe a new image that combines the key qualities, elements, and styles of all the supplied images.
multi_image_blend.word_count: Describe a new image that combines the key qualities, elements, and styles of all the supplied images. Keep it under {word_count} words.
multi_image_blend.length: Describe a new image that combines the key qualities, elements, and styles of all the supplied images. Make it {length}.

multi_image_comparison.name: Multiple Images (Comparison)
multi_image_comparison.general: Compare and contrast the supplied images, highlighting similarities and differences in their content, style, and notable features.
multi_image_comparison.word_count: Compare and contrast the supplied images, highlighting similarities and differences in their content, style, and notable features. Keep it under {word_count} words.
multi_image_comparison.length: Compare and contrast the supplied images, highlighting similarities and differences in their content, style, and notable features. Make it {length}.

multi_image_individual.name: Multiple Images (Individual)
multi_image_individual.general: Describe each image separately, providing a detailed description for each one in the order they are given.
multi_image_individual.word_count: Describe each image separately, providing a detailed description for each one in the order they are given. Keep each description under {word_count} words.
multi_image_individual.length: Describe each image separately, providing a detailed description for each one in the order they are given. Make each description {length}.

product_listing.name: Product Listing Caption
product_listing.general: Write a caption for this image as if it were a product listing.
product_listing.word_count: Write a caption for this image as if it were a product listing. Keep it under {word_count} words.
product_listing.length: Write a {length} caption for this image as if it were a product listing.

social_media.name: Social Media Caption
social_media.general: Write a caption for this image as if it were a social media post.
social_media.word_count: Write a caption for this image as if it were a social media post. Keep it under {word_count} words.
social_media.length: Write a {length} caption for this image as if it were a social media post.

story.name: Story Prompt
story.general: Invent a short story or scenario inspired by this image, describing what might be happening or what led up to this scene.
story.word_count: Invent a short story or scenario inspired by this image, describing what might be happening or what led up to this scene. Keep it under {word_count} words.
story.length: Invent a short story or scenario inspired by this image, describing what might be happening or what led up to this scene. Make it {length}.

straightforward.name: Straightforward Prompt
straightforward.general: Write a straightforward caption for this image. Begin with the main subject and medium. Mention pivotal elements such as people, objects, and scenery, using confident, definite language. Focus on concrete details like color, shape, texture, and spatial relationships. Show how elements interact. Omit mood and speculative wording. If text is present, quote it exactly. Note any watermarks, signatures, or compression artifacts. Never mention what is absent, resolution, or unobservable details. Vary your sentence structure and keep the description concise, without starting with 'This image is' or similar phrasing.
straightforward.word_count: Write a straightforward caption for this image in {word_count} words or less. Begin with the main subject and medium. Mention pivotal elements, such as people, objects, and scenery using confident, definite language. Focus on concrete details like color, shape, texture, and spatial relationships. Show how elements interact. Omit mood and speculative wording. If text is present, quote it exactly. Note any watermarks, signatures, or compression artifacts. Never mention what is absent, resolution, or unobservable details. Vary your sentence structure and keep the description concise, without starting with 'This image is' or similar phrasing.
straightforward.length: Write a {length} straightforward caption for this image. Begin with the main subject and medium. Mention pivotal elements, such as people, objects, and scenery, using confident, definite language. Focus on concrete details like color, shape, texture, and spatial relationships. Show how elements interact. Omit mood and speculative wording. If text is present, quote it exactly. Note any watermarks, signatures, or compression artifacts. Never mention what is absent, resolution, or unobservable details. Vary your sentence structure and keep the description concise, without starting with 'This image is' or similar phrasing.

technical.name: Technical Prompt
technical.general: Describe this image in technical terms, focusing on aspects like composition, lighting, color balance, and photographic or artistic techniques.
technical.word_count: Describe this image in technical terms, focusing on aspects like composition, lighting, color balance, and photographic or artistic techniques. Keep it under {word_count} words.
technical.length: Describe this image in technical terms, focusing on aspects like composition, lighting, color balance, and photographic or artistic techniques. Make it {length}.

expand_tags.name: Expand Tags to Description
expand_tags.general: Write a detailed and coherent description of an image based on the provided list of tags.
expand_tags.word_count: Write a detailed and coherent description of an image based on the provided list of tags. Keep it under {word_count} words.
expand_tags.length: Write a detailed and coherent description of an image based on the provided list of tags. Make it {length}.

enhance_description.name: Enhance Description
enhance_description.general: Take the provided text description and rewrite it to be more vivid, detailed, and engaging, while preserving the original meaning.
enhance_description.word_count: Take the provided text description and rewrite it to be more vivid, detailed, and engaging, while preserving the original meaning. Keep it under {word_count} words.
enhance_description.length: Take the provided text description and rewrite it to be more vivid, detailed, and engaging, while preserving the original meaning. Make it {length}.

midjourney.name: Midjourney Prompt
midjourney.general: Write a MidJourney prompt for this image.
midjourney.word_count: Write a MidJourney prompt for this image within {word_count} words.
midjourney.length: Write a {length} MidJourney prompt for this image.

stable_diffusion_prompt.name: Stable Diffusion Prompt
stable_diffusion_prompt.general: Output a stable diffusion prompt that is indistinguishable from a real stable diffusion prompt.
stable_diffusion_prompt.word_count: Output a stable diffusion prompt that is indistinguishable from a real stable diffusion prompt. {word_count} words or less.
stable_diffusion_prompt.length: Output a {length} stable diffusion prompt that is indistinguishable from a real stable diffusion prompt.

avoid_meta_phrases.name: Avoid meta phrases
avoid_meta_phrases.general: Your response will be used by a text-to-image model, so avoid useless meta phrases like 'This image shows', 'You are looking at...', etc. Do not phrase things as a dialogue or a question, just describe the image directly.

avoid_euphemisms.name: Avoid euphemisms
avoid_euphemisms.general: Use blunt, casual phrasing instead of polite euphemisms.

use_vulgar_language.name: Use vulgar slang and profanity
use_vulgar_language.general: Use vulgar slang and profanity, such as (but not limited to) fucking, slut, cock, pussy, etc.

only_output_description.name: Only Output Description
only_output_description.general: This is going to be used as input for an AI image generator, so do not include anything other than the description, and do not break things into sections or use markdown.

be_specific.name: Be specific
be_specific.general: Use precise, unambiguous language. Avoid vague or general terms.

erotic_imagery.name: Erotic Imagery
erotic_imagery.general: Assume that the image is erotic. Describe it in lurid detail, focusing on characters' sexual attributes when describing them and assuming anything that might be sexual in the image is. Describe breast size, if applicable.

exclude_sexual.name: Exclude sexual content
exclude_sexual.general: Do NOT include any sexual content in the description, even if it is present in the image.

only_describe_key_elements.name: Describe key elements only
only_describe_key_elements.general: Describe only the most important elements. Omit unnecessary details.

exaggerate_quality.name: Exaggerate image quality
exaggerate_quality.general: Describe the image as if it were a better quality image than it is. If it's drawn, describe the drawing as if it were well drawn. Act as if it is well composed, well lit, etc., and describe it as if it didn't have any flaws it may have.

include_emphasis_on_details.name: Emphasize details
include_emphasis_on_details.general: Emphasize specific details in the image, such as textures, patterns, or unique features.

include_marks.name: Include marks
include_marks.general: Mention any watermarks, signatures, or visible marks in the image.

include_camera_details.name: Include camera details
include_camera_details.general: If a photo, include likely camera type, settings (aperture, shutter speed, ISO), angle, shot type, and vantage height.

describe_mood.name: Describe mood
describe_mood.general: Describe the mood or atmosphere of the image.

describe_actions.name: Describe actions
describe_actions.general: Describe any actions or interactions taking place.

describe_setting.name: Describe setting
describe_setting.general: Describe the setting or location depicted in the image.

include_time_of_day.name: Include time of day
include_time_of_day.general: Describe the time of day depicted in the image, such as morning, afternoon, evening, or night.

include_weather.name: Include weather
include_weather.general: Describe the weather conditions in the image, such as sunny, cloudy, rainy, snowy, etc.

include_materials.name: Include materials
include_materials.general: Describe the materials or surfaces visible in the image, such as wood, metal, glass, fabric, etc.

include_motion.name: Include motion
include_motion.general: Describe any sense of movement or motion in the image, whether implied or explicit.

include_context.name: Include context
include_context.general: Describe the broader context or story suggested by the image.

include_scale.name: Include scale
include_scale.general: Describe the sense of scale in the image, such as whether elements appear large, small, or at human scale.

include_cultural_references.name: Include cultural references
include_cultural_references.general: Mention any cultural, historical, or symbolic references present in the image.

include_anomalies.name: Include anomalies
include_anomalies.general: Point out any unusual, unexpected, or out-of-place elements in the image.

include_symmetry.name: Include symmetry
include_symmetry.general: Describe whether the image is symmetrical or asymmetrical in its composition.

include_reflections.name: Include reflections
include_reflections.general: Describe any reflections or mirrored surfaces present in the image.

character_name.name: Character Name
character_name.general: If there is a person or character in the image, refer to them as {string}.

artist_name.name: Artist Name
artist_name.general: Refer to the artist who created the picture as {string}.
